p: Samples of 10 μl from each well with a concentration at and above the MIC of the antimicrobial agent being tested [ 32] were taken, and the inoculum was spread over the MHA plate with a sterile cotton swab [ 36]. The plates were incubated at 37°C for 24 h. After incubation, visible colonies were counted on each subculture plate, as well as the initial inoculum plates. The MBC was recorded as the lowest concentration of the plant extract in which there was a reduction of the initial inoculum by 99.9% [ 37].
